memberdef.argsstring: (std::istream &stream, const std::string &filepath, std::string &error, std::vector< std::pair< std::string, std::string > > &options, std::list< SectionInfo > &sections)
memberdef.name: GetConfigOptions

detaileddescription.para: Most paths passed as configuration arguments are treated as relative to the datadir if they are not absolute.

parameterdescription.para: The path to be conditionally prefixed with datadir.
